snippet.title: Warhammer Underworlds: Online – Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Out Now on Steam: http://bit.ly/WUOSteam
Join us on Discord: http://bit.ly/WUODiscord

Lose yourself in the winding streets of the Mirrored City. Out now!

--About Warhammer Underworlds: Online--
Join the battle for glory with Warhammer Underworlds: Online, the ultimate dice-and-cards strategy skirmish video game. Pit mighty warbands against one another in an eternal battle for Glory in the realms of the Age of Sigmar!

Based on the hit tabletop games Warhammer Underworlds: Shadespire, Warhammer Underworlds: Nightvault and Warhammer Underworlds: Beastgrave from Games Workshop. 

Warhammer Underworlds: Online was released April 21st 2020 for PC on Steam. 

Join us on Discord and on Steam to keep up-to-date with the latest news on the game.

--Social Media--
🟣Discord:  http://bit.ly/WUODiscord
🐦Twitter:  http://bit.ly/WUOTwitter
📘 Facebook:  http://bit.ly/WUOFacebook
📸 Instagram: http://bit.ly/WUOInsta

🎥Missed our previous streams?
🆒Twitch Channel: https://www.twitch.tv/steelskyprod
🚩YouTube Channel: http://bit.ly/WUOYoutube

🌐Website: http://www.warhammerunderworlds-online.com 

🛒 OUT NOW ON STEAM: http://bit.ly/WUOSteam
